title: Doyald Young lecture at AIGA/OC
content:
Fonts and Logos (lecture)   
Doyald Young   
April 29th   
Irvine Lecture Hall at Chapman University   
7:00 pm   
Lecture sponsored by Orange County (Calif) AIGA   
(no charge)   
   
   
MOre info and map of campus linked to web site   
 [http://www.aigaoc.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018014501/http:/www.aigaoc.org/)
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
Also, take at look at this book.   
   
 [http://www.typebooks.org/r-logotypes.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018014501/http:/www.typebooks.org/r-logotypes.htm)
